item.title: By: Mike Miller
item.dc:creator: Mike Miller
item.description: <p>About seven years ago I visited Munich as a day stop while returning from an Austrian ski trip. I hope to return some day as the beer was fantastic and the sights just as interesting. Being an American, I too was grateful for the Germans and Austrians knowing English.</p>
item.content:encoded: About seven years ago I visited Munich as a day stop while returning from an Austrian ski trip. I hope to return some day as the beer was fantastic and the sights just as interesting. Being an American, I too was grateful for the Germans and Austrians knowing English.
